title.rendered: How to spot a phishing attempt

content.rendered:
[vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]

Phishing is one of the most common cyber threats we face today.

Phishing involves cyber criminals sending emails that pose as legitimate organisations to target hundreds of millions of recipients every day. The messages direct recipients to a landing page or a website to encourage them to enter their personal information or download a malicious attachment.

Scroll down for our free infographic on how to spot a phishing attempt.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column]

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_single_image image=”13196″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][/vc_column][/vc_row]
